project_info.name: nf-sp00f
project_info.purpose: Advanced EMV security research platform for Android 14+

Apdu/Emv utilities unit-tested on JVM (ApduUtils, EmvTlvParser)
in_progress: CI integration for Android JVM and instrumentation tests

Add CI device-run configuration (device farm or emulator verification)
